24
RDF and RDF Schema
RDF (and other W3C Recommendations) and URIs
•
For practical purposes, especially if handwritten, URIs are 
shortened using XML namespaces
–
xmlns:oeg=“http://www.oeg-upm.net/ontologies/people#”
–
oeg:Oscar is equivalent to http://www.oeg-
upm.net/ontologies/people#Oscar
oeg:Oscar
oeg:Asun
oeg:Raúl
“http://www.fi.upm.es/”
